name: Memory One
description:
This game has been created in 6 days during the First Dami Game Jam. 

The theme of the jam was 'Memory'. 

In this game, you need to remember the position of every object in each room. If you place everything back, you'll receive a good score.

Please, don't try to cheat. This is intended to test your memory, not your cellphone camera. :)

Made by DamiOS and Jessica.
